contents: Article 4 (Composition) ① The committee shall be composed of the following members. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice chairpersons *3. Up to 21 members (including the chairman and vice-chairman) ② When forming committee members, the following items must be observed. Revised on April 28, 2016, April 3, 2017, and January 31, 2019. Committee members are comprised of athletes or former athletes, and only one person from each sport can be appointed as a member. 2. Among the members, 13 members (hereinafter referred to as *elected members) are elected by a vote of the electoral college composed of national athletes in Olympic sports as of the election date, and the qualifications for candidacy as an elected member are to be national athletes in Olympic sports as of the election date or within 4 years. He is a person who has experience as a national team member in an Olympic sport, and other members (hereinafter referred to as *appointed members) are appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *President) from among athletes or former athletes. Revised 2021. 12. 27. 2-2. When forming the appointed committee, a human rights expert with more than 5 years of experience working in the relevant field must be included. 3. Persons who are national team athletes in Olympic sports at the time of election or appointment or have experience as national team athletes in Olympic sports within four years must constitute the majority of the committee. 4. Members of the IOC Athletes' Committee and the Olympic Council of Asia's Athletes' Committee shall be ex officio members and shall be regarded as appointed members under subparagraph 2. 5. Any person who is disqualified under Article 45, Paragraph 3 of the Articles of Incorporation cannot become a member. Revised December 27, 2021. 6. The ratio of male and female members must be at least 30% each. 7. Summer sports and winter sports must be balanced at a ratio of 3:1, which applies to elected and appointed members, respectively. 8. Members must be over 16 years of age and must not have been subject to disciplinary action in relation to the World Anti-Doping Code. ③ The electors for the election of election members under Paragraph 2, Item 2 shall be registered voters, and the specific method of forming the electoral college and election procedures shall be determined by internal regulations. ④ The chairperson and vice-chairperson are elected from among the elected members. ⑤ The committee shall have one secretary, who shall be appointed by the president from among the staff of the Sports Council. ⑥ The committee may establish subcommittees for efficient operation. ⑦ In order to minimize the possibility of unfair intervention by interested parties in the deliberation and resolution process of the committee by diagnosing the work ethics of members in advance, elected and appointed members must prepare and submit Form No. 1 and Form No. 2. shall. Newly established 2021. 12. 27.
